comment: More people seriously need to read and repost this - yes, even the Torba loyalists. Very, very good and nuanced take on the whole Loli censorship shitshow.

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / need-01

            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / read-01

            :ARG2-of (s / serious-01)

comment: Molesting children is a crime. Wanting to molest children is gross, but not a crime. Am I missing anything?
amr:

      :snt1 (c / crime-02

                  :ARG1 (c2 / child)))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (g / gross-05

                        :ARG1 (m3 / molest-01
                              :ARG1 (c4 / child))))
            :ARG2 (c5 / crime-02

                  :ARG1 w))
      :snt3 (m4 / miss-02

            :ARG1 (a / anything)
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)))
